post.body: Karl Rove describes Obama's cabinet selections as "reassuring"...
Veiled in apparently moot calls to action, Monbiot appears to be saying "light 'em up folks cuz we're going down..."
I deplore people who do not appreciate the difference between a satsuma and a clementine.
Testing this madness. Too much coffee and haribo has induced a state of bullet-time hyper-vigilance.
